Thanks Alex.
To get net.sourceforge.phpeclipse_1.0.6a to work you will need to add the JUnit 
plugin. 

We will test on the Platform Runtime Binary. To stay away from the 
NullPointerException, do not attempt to go to the Debug Action Groups 
preference page. 
Note that this is not a problem in the full SDK.
I have decreased to normal the severity as I do not see this as a blocker.
*** Bug 38771 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed in DebugActionGroupsContentProvider.
Please verify DarinW.
*** Bug 35780 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
